title: Venpaniye  Munpaniye Lyrics Ko Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers : Sriram Parthasarathy & Bombay Jayshree
Song: Venpaniye
Movie: Ko
Lyrics : Pa. Vijay

Everything is chilled now, All is gonna be alright
Oh i'll be there, i'll be there for you
Everything is chilled now, Frozen in love
Lets warm and close around now

Venpaniye munpaniye, En thozhil saaindhidava
Indrirave nanvagale, En kannil tholaindhidava
Unnirul nerangal, Un vizhi eerangal,
Kannale theegiradhe
En pani kaalangal, Ponveyil saaralgal,
Unnaal uraigiradhe

Vinpaniye munpaniye, En thozhil saaindhidava
Inriraven nanvagale, En kannil tholaindhidava
Ennirul nerangal, En vizhi eerangal,
Unnale theegiradhe
En pani kaalangal, Ponveyil saaralgal,
Unnaal uraigiradhe

Oru imai kulira, Oru imai velira
Unakkulle uranginen
Oru idhal malara, Maru idhal ulara
Unayadhil unargiren

Kadhalaal paga malarndhadhu kadhalaal
Aaidhalaal idhal nanaindhadhu thoydhalal
Inayum inum

Everything is chilled now
All is gonna be alright
Oh i'll be there, i'll be there for you
Everything is chilled now
Frozen in love
Lets warm and close around now

Imaigalil nalaindhum, Iruvizhi nuzhaindhum
Iranginaai manadhulle,
Mudhal nodi maranam Marunodi jananam
Yenakkulle, yenakkulle

Yavvanam.. adhil ivaloru savvanam
Sovedham nadhilalaindhida vaayiram
Kanam kaname

Venpaniye munpaniye, En thozhil saaindhidava
Indrirave nanvagale, En kannil tholaindhidava
Unnirul nerangal, Un vizhi eerangal,
Kannale theegiradhe
En pani kaalangal, Ponveyil saaralgal,
Unnaal uraigiradhe
